forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow before 8am, then a chance of snow showers between 8am and 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 37. Northwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. North northeast wind 2 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Rain And Snow Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely after 3pm. Partly sunny. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. South wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: 6-inches of snow on Thursday and a complete powertilling of the upper loops to World Cup specs this morning. A touch soft today, but should be an amazing 7-10 day stretch starting tomorrow. Huge shoutout to Ben and the entire crew at Nubs for their commitment to Nordic skiing.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts and the Rope Tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Upper Trails will be groomed later today. We are clearing brush from the wind yesterday.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a great day to be on skis. The heavy wet snow from yesterday has dried out and the groomed surface is in great shape. We still have excellent coverage on the majority of our terrain. Sunshine and warmth are forecast as the day progresses and should bring spring snow conditions this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
